issue.title: [CF 503] Something REALLY bad happened again
issue.body:
Date: 2012-05-22 21:23:42
ID: 1
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: TellMeWhen: Something REALLY bad happened that should not have happened. This isn't a non-critical error anymore, so please report this to Cybeloras!  a: icon  b: nil
Debug:
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2995: Assert()
   ...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:5594: GetLayoutName()
   TellMeWhen_Options\ImportExport.lua:524: Import_BuildContainingDropdownEntry()
   TellMeWhen_Options\ImportExport.lua:511: Import_HolderMenuHandler()
   TellMeWhen_Options\ImportExport.lua:871: initFunction()
   ..\FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:69: UIDropDownMenu_Initialize()
   ..\FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:860: ToggleDropDownMenu()
   [string "*:OnEnter"]:5:
      [string "*:OnEnter"]:1


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #503 | Raw

comments.body:
I need to take that error message out since I basically fixed it. This is happening because TMW is reading settings that have not gone through the upgrade process that will fix this issue. Once settings are actually imported, the issue will disappear, but until then it really isn't an issue because the text layout that this is occurring with isn't actually being used to layout texts.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
